SELECT t1.order_id AS orderId, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.goods_id AS goodsId, t1.pay_price AS payPrice, t1.third_order AS thirdOrder, t1.recharge_account AS account, t1.selling_price AS sellingPrice, t1.purchase_price AS purchasePrice, t1.unit_price AS unitPrice, t1.product_code AS productCode, t1.client_ip AS clientIP, t1.order_state AS orderState, t1.buy_num AS buyNum, t1.create_at AS createAt, t1.code AS code, t2.goods_title AS goodsTitle FROM czb_equity_payment_order t1, czb_equity_payment_commodity t2 WHERE t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id
and t1.recharge_account = #{account}
and (t1.create_at <= #{overDate} and t1.create_at >= #{beginDate})
ORDER BY t1.create_at DESC

SELECT
t1.category_id AS categoryId, t1.category_name AS categoryName, t1.is_hot AS categoryIsHot
t2.type_id AS typeId, t2.is_hot AS typeIsHot, t2.type_name AS typeName
FROM
czb_equity_payment_category t1
czb_equity_payment_type t2 WHERE t2.category_id = #{categoryId}

select t1.order_id orderId, t1.third_order thirdOrder, t1.unit_price unitPrice, t1.buy_num buyNum, t1.pay_price payPrice, t1.create_at createAt, t1.recharge_account account, t1.order_state orderState, t1.code, t1.pay_method payMethod, t1.product_code productCode, t2.goods_title goodsTitle from czb_equity_payment_order t1 left join czb_equity_payment_commodity t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id where t1.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
